regen.absent_element: automatic termination of the emergency call
regen.new_specification: The system shall automatically terminate the Railway emergency call after a specified period of inactivity or when manually terminated by the driver.

regen.absent_element: deactivation of visual and audible alert after call termination
regen.new_specification: The system shall deactivate the visual and audible alert in the cab upon termination of the Railway emergency call.

regen.absent_element: specific action for termination of emergency call
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide a specific action to terminate the Railway emergency call from the cab.

label: Once the call is terminated, the continuous visual alarm indication in the cab shall cease.
